summary: adds Grandmaster Jauffre\'s Katana into the world of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml: This mod adds a Katana belonging to a previous grandmaster of the blades. The Katana belonged to a previous grandmaster of the blades who lived in the third era called jauffre. The sword has a high base damage of 75 and a nice electric aura around it, it has been enchanted so it deals additional damage to dragons. Its speed is slightly faster than normal, its value is very high and its critical damage deals an additional 25 damage points. The sword can be found in riverwood, in the sleeping giant inn. Look in Delphine\'s secret room then look next to the chest, it will be on the right hand side of it.
author: K9Z
